verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w How|strong="H0575"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* do \w you|strong="H5704"\w* afflict \w my|strong="H5704"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* break \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* pieces \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*?

\w Behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* confound \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w are|strong="H6235"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* \w to|strong="H0954"\w* oppress \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.
\w For|strong="H0854"\w* if \w I|strong="H0551"\w* \w have|strong="H0637"\w* been ignorant, \w my|strong="H0854"\w* ignorance \w shall|strong="H0637"\w* be \w with|strong="H0854"\w* me.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* set \w yourselves|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1431"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w reproaches|strong="H2781"\w*.

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* least \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* equal judgment, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* compassed \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* scourges.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* suffering \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w will|strong="H0369"\w* hear: \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w aloud|strong="H6817"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w judge|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* hath hedged \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w path|strong="H0734"\w* round \w about|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H2822"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w*, \w and|strong="H2822"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w way|strong="H0734"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* hath \w stripped|strong="H6584"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5422"\w* hath \w destroyed|strong="H5422"\w* \w me|strong="H5422"\w* \w on|strong="H5265"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* I am lost, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H5422"\w* hath taken away \w my|strong="H5439"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*, as \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w a|strong="H5265"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* that is \w plucked|strong="H5265"\w* up.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w is|strong="H0639"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hath \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* enemy.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w troops|strong="H1416"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* made \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* besieged \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* hath \w put|strong="H7368"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* acquaintance \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* departed \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3045"\w* \w kinsmen|strong="H7138"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* forsaken \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H7911"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*.

They \w that|strong="H1961"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* maidservants \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* \w me|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w alien|strong="H5237"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*, \w I|strong="H5650"\w* entreated \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w with|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H5650"\w* own \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

My \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* hath abhorred my \w breath|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* entreated \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* my \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*.

\w Even|strong="H1571"\w* fools \w despise|strong="H3988"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*; \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H1571"\w* gone \w from|strong="H6965"\w* them, \w they|strong="H1571"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H2088"\w* sometime \w my|strong="H3605"\w* counsellors, \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w abhorred|strong="H8581"\w* \w me|strong="H8581"\w*: \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* whom \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* most \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H8581"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4422"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* being consumed. \w My|strong="H6106"\w* \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* hath cleaved \w to|strong="H4422"\w* \w my|strong="H6106"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* nothing \w but|strong="H1320"\w* lips \w are|strong="H6106"\w* \w left|strong="H4422"\w* about \w my|strong="H6106"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H0859"\w* \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5060"\w*, \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5060"\w*, \w at|strong="H0433"\w* least \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord hath \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w me|strong="H5060"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* glut yourselves \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w my|strong="H7291"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H0645"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w may|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H0645"\w* they \w may|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w marked|strong="H2710"\w* \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w*?

With an \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w pen|strong="H5842"\w* \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w in|strong="H5703"\w* \w a|strong="H2672"\w* plate \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w lead|strong="H5777"\w*, or else be graven with an instrument \w in|strong="H5703"\w* \w flint|strong="H6697"\w* stone.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* liveth, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w last|strong="H0314"\w* day \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H1350"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1320"\w* \w I|strong="H0310"\w* \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* be clothed \w again|strong="H0310"\w* \w with|strong="H1320"\w* \w my|strong="H0310"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w my|strong="H0310"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w I|strong="H0310"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w see|strong="H2372"\w* \w my|strong="H0310"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*.

\w Whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w myself|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w another|strong="H2114"\w*: \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* hope \w is|strong="H0834"\w* laid \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w then|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w*: Let \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* let \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* occasion \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w against|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*?

Flee \w then|strong="H4616"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* revenger \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* ye \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1779"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1779"\w*.
